page.title: 07KINGMOOR INDUSTRY
page.content: {KINGMOOR INDUSTRY} Kingstown is Carlisle's largest industrial estate.The area originally developed as an airfield which was used between the 1930's-50's. The first firms moved in at the beginning of the 1960's.The first purpose-built roads were constructed & sites offered in 1965 & by 1967 some 27 sites were developed. The site was made even more convenient in the early 70's because of easy access to the newly constucted M6 which was within quarter of a mile.By 1982 the estate had nearly reached its full capacity.Now there are nearly 100 firms working on the estate.These include Coca Cola, Marks & Spencer,Greenall Whitley & many others.
